###### Transformed {.tabset .tabset-pills}

##### Small

```{r}
patch_type_input_model = c("Small connected to small",
                           "Small connected to large")
```

```{r}
filtered_data = ds_patches_effect_size %>%
                         filter(time_point >= first_time_point_model,
                                time_point <= last_time_point_model,
                                patch_type %in% patch_type_input_model)
```

```{r}
plot.patches.points.ES.log(filtered_data,
                           patch_type_input_model,
                           response_variable)
```

**Construct full model**

```{r}
full_model = lm(log(get(response_variable) + 2) ~
                  size_connected_patch +
                  size_connected_patch : day,
                data = filtered_data)
```

```{r}
summary(full_model)
par(mfrow = c(2, 3))
plot(full_model, which = 1:5)
```

**Test `size_connected_patch` and `size_connected_patch : day`**

```{r}
null_model = lm(log(get(response_variable) + 2) ~
                  1,
                data = filtered_data)

summary(null_model)
par(mfrow = c(2, 3))
plot(full_model, which = 1:5)
model_stats = compute.model.stats(full_model,
                            null_model,
                            "linear_model")

model_stats

results_table = fill.results.table(results_table,
                                   paste("Log", response_variable),
                                   patch_type_input_model,
                                   model_stats)
```
